product_name: Kiehl's Since 1851Eye Fuel Eye Cream for Dark Circles
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingGive BackThe Eye Fuel Eye Cream for Dark Circles is a men's eye cream by Kiehl's Since 1851 with caffeine and vitamin B3 that helps reduce dark circles and eye puffiness.
details: DetailsBenefitsVisibly reduces the appearance of dark circles and puffy eyesSmooths the under eye area with weightless hydration for cooling, refreshing reliefFor all skin typesKey IngredientsCaffeine: an alkaloid known for its stimulating properties; in Kiehl's formulas, it helps energize and reduce dullnessVitamin B3: niacinamide, the form of vitamin B3 used, is known to help brighten skin; when used in topical skincare formulas, it helps illuminate skin for increased radianceItem 2536743How To UseSqueeze a small amount onto fingertip. Gently tap under the eye and along the orbital bone until absorbed. Use morning and night.IngredientsAqua/Water, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Caffeine, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/PEG-10/15 Crosspolymer, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Hydroxyethylpiperazine Ethane Sulfonic Acid, Sodium Chloride, Perlite, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Citrate, P-Anisic Acid, Tocopherol, Disodium Edta, Steareth-20, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Adenosine, Glycine Soja Protein/Soybean Protein, Dipropylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Chlorhexidine Digluconate, N-Hydroxysuccinimide, Potassium Sorbate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Palmitoyl Oligopeptide, Chrysin, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Squeeze a small amount onto fingertip. Gently tap under the eye and along the orbital bone until absorbed. Use morning and night.

reviews.headline: Still can't get over how good it is!
reviews.comments: Amazing! My eyes feel and look brighter. Such a bargain! No problem using under makeup. I had used a $75 under eye product for 3+ years. I did not realize how much better my eyes could look until I tried this one randomly! Definitely get it!!

reviews.headline: Better than Tula
reviews.comments: I had been using this for a long time and then got swept up in the Tula hype and tried their under eye product that is x2 the price... needless to say I switched back to the product ASAP. Makes my morning puffy eyes look like I've had a good night sleep

reviews.headline: Not worth it
reviews.comments: My bf knows more about what ingredients are good for his dark circles then I do and he said there isn't anything in there to help with it at all.

reviews.headline: Not crazy about this
reviews.comments: I apply this over my moisturizer. Seems to help the dark circles. I will not purchase this again.  Time to try another product.

reviews.headline: Yes I will be buying over and over
reviews.comments: All natural, light weight, doesn't burn the eye's

reviews.headline: Love this stuff
reviews.comments: I have been using this eye cream on and off for two years. I keep coming back because I feel that it's the only one that really works for me. The others I have tried are only because I get them as free samples but this one seems to work wonders on my eye bags!

reviews.headline: Wouldn't repurchase
reviews.comments: Had high hopes because of the brand. I have used eye creams from the drugstore that I like better. Doesn't sit well under makeup and isn't moisturizing enough! Feels like almost water and does nothing for darkness and bags.

easy to use no scent or stickiness

faceoff_positive.comments: This product is excellent. I have no idea how such a small amount of product makes me look so good every morning. This absolutely must be added to every man's daily skin regime. It reduces puffiness and decreases fine lines, for real. For all of you party animals out there that wake up 30 minutes before you have to be at work, this one is for you!
faceoff_positive.headline: Must Use Daily

faceoff_negative.comments:
I'm a Kiehl's loyalist so when I started noticing dark circles under my eyes on some days, I recalled this product which had been so highly recommended to me. Years of late studying and long nights at the office had me looking a little tired, I guess.

After a few weeks of use, I am not seeing any improvement or change from thisproduct. I use as directed but have never seen the puffiness or dark circles go away. I might try the Marine firming creme next time, because so far, Eye Alert has done nothing.
faceoff_negative.headline: Still not seeing a difference

rollup.name: Eye Fuel Eye Cream for Dark Circles
